_metadata.course_description: This course covers basic concepts in optimization and heuristic search with an emphasis on process improvement and optimization.
learning_outcomes: Develop and solve optimization models in a number of domains such as supply chain modeling, marketing, production, asset management, capital budgeting, and financial portfolio analysis.
Analyze optimization models arising in data analysis.
Develop simulation models and design simulation experiments.
Perform process mining on workflow logs.
Comprehend optimization models that arise in machine learning and deploy appropriate optimization methods.
